SELECT DISTINCT m.* FROM movies m LEFT JOIN credits c ON m.id = c.movie_id WHERE
(LOWER(m.title) LIKE '%' || LOWER(#{searchInput}) || '%' OR LOWER(m.original_title) LIKE '%' || LOWER(#{searchInput}) || '%')
LOWER(c.name) LIKE '%' || LOWER(#{searchInput}) || '%'
ORDER BY release_date DESC

SELECT DISTINCT m.* FROM Movies m JOIN MovieGenres mg ON m.id = mg.movie_id JOIN genres g ON mg.genre_id = g.id WHERE g.name IN
#{genre}
SELECT m.* FROM movies m WHERE release_date BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} ORDER BY release_date DESC
SELECT DISTINCT g.* FROM genres g JOIN MovieGenres mg ON g.id = mg.genre_id WHERE mg.movie_id = #{movieId}
SELECT c.* FROM ( SELECT *, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY profile_path ORDER BY profile_path) AS rn FROM Credits WHERE movie_id = #{movieId} AND job = 'Actor' ) c WHERE c.rn = 1
SELECT c.* FROM ( SELECT *, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY profile_path ORDER BY profile_path) AS rn FROM Credits WHERE movie_id = #{movieId} AND job != 'Actor' ) c WHERE c.rn = 1
SELECT b.*, m.nickname FROM Board b JOIN member m ON b.member_id = m.id WHERE b.movie_id = #{movieId} ORDER BY b.created_at DESC
